Text: Get Your Picks In POWERPOOLThis is your reminder to get your picks in for the POWERPOOL pool Your picks are due within hours from the time this mailing was sent Your pick deadline is Thursday PM Pacific Time Start Your Baseball Playoff Pool jumptocfmid Run your own baseball pool for the playoffs at Office Football Pool OFP offers pool formats for the baseball playoffs including Share Pools where you and your buddies create a virtual sportsbook and make bets against each other and Square pools like the ones you see for the superbowl Share Pools only cost and Square Pools are totally free Start Your Pool Now jumptocfmid You may access your picks by Clicking Here pickscfm Good luck this week John If you get this mail more than once have trouble reading it or dont find it useful please let me know You may unsubscribe to future reminder notices by clicking on this link No More Reminders Thanks unsubcfmidcalROS PLEASE DO NOT REPLY TO THIS AUTOMATED EMAIL MESSAGE Mail Sent to MIKE NRONCOM
